Photoshop is a powerful, essential tool for any photographer, but learning to use it effectively can be overwhelming. Join award-winning photographer Dave Cross for a workshop that will demystify Photoshop and allow you to use it like a pro.

In this three-day course, Dave will focus on the important Photoshop skills youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll need to create professional-caliber work. Dave will share tips and tricks for using Photoshop more quickly and efficiently, including preset options, automatic functions, and more.

Whether youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re just starting out with Photoshop or an experienced user hoping to hone your skills, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ll leave this course ready to take full advantage of what Photoshop has to offer.
